    Methods inherited from interface org.ironmaple.simulation.motorsims.ControlRequest

    updateSignal

  • Method Details

    • updateSignal

      default edu.wpi.first.units.measure.Voltage updateSignal(SimMotorConfigs configs, edu.wpi.first.units.measure.Angle mechanismAngle, edu.wpi.first.units.measure.AngularVelocity mechanismVelocity)
      Description copied from interface: ControlRequest

      Updates the control signal based on the motor's state.

      Given the motor's current configuration and state (angular position and velocity), this method calculates the control signal (voltage) that should be applied to the motor.

      Specified by:
      updateSignal in interface ControlRequest
      Parameters:
      configs - the motor's configuration
      mechanismAngle - the final position of the mechanism
      mechanismVelocity - the final velocity of the mechanism
      Returns:
      the updated control signal in volts
